name: Clarin_Karagan
content:
Clarin Karagan was a male Human Jedi Knight who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Serving the Jedi Order as a Consular, Karagan was active in the galaxy during the years of the Sith resurgence in the prelude to the Clone Wars.
A Force-sensitive trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, Clarin Karagan had passed his Trials of Knighthood and attained the rank of Jedi Knight. Pursuing independent study as a Jedi Consular, Karagan accepted missions from the Jedi High Council tat took him around the galaxy. In 31 BBY, Jedi Karagan attended the SoroSuub Corporation's Anniversary celebration in the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius. Part of a Jedi delegation from the Academy of Almas, Karagan and his colleagues ensured a safe environment at the celebration as well as participating in the festivities.
